column4: hello, someone know how to replace a word in many different directory
explain what you mean, do you mean a word in many text files in different directories, or renaming directories or what
there are a few ways to do it, if there is some parent directory that you can cd into, you can just do: find . -type f -exec sed 's/color=red/color=blue/g' -i '{}' \;
after cding into the parent directory of course
